meanings.sent1: The unanticipated rain caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: The unanticipated guest arrived at the party.
meanings.sent3: The unanticipated snowstorm turned the town into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: Her unanticipated decision to quit her job left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent5: The unanticipated noise in the quiet library startled the students.

meanings.definition: Happening or appearing without warning or preparation.
meanings.sent1: The unanticipated visit from her friend made her day.
meanings.sent2: The unanticipated power outage left the neighborhood in darkness.
meanings.sent3: The unanticipated arrival of the pizza delivery guy saved the day.
meanings.sent4: His unanticipated question left her speechless.
meanings.sent5: The unanticipated applause at the end of the performance was heartwarming.
